com.teamten.render

Class Intersection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.render.Intersection

  • public class Intersection
extends Object
    Records the results of an intersection hit.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Intersection() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getMinT()
      The parametric distance along the ray to the intersection.
      Vector getNormal()
      Utility method for getting the normal of the triangle at the intersection point (interpolating the vertex normals), taking into account whether it's backfacing.
      Vector getPoint()
      Get the point in 3D space of the intersection.
      Triangle getTriangle()
      Return the triangle that was intersected, or null if the ray hit nothing.
      boolean isBackfacing()
      Whether our intersection hit the back of the triangle.
      void update(Triangle triangle, Vector point, double minT, boolean backfacing)
      Set all the fields at once.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Intersection

        public Intersection()

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Triangle triangle,
                   Vector point,
                   double minT,
                   boolean backfacing)
        Set all the fields at once.
        Parameters:
        triangle - the triangle that was hit, or null if none.
        point - the point in 3D where the ray hit the triangle.
        minT - the distance along the ray where it hit the triangle.
        backfacing - whether the triangle was facing away from the ray.

      • getTriangle

        public Triangle getTriangle()
        Return the triangle that was intersected, or null if the ray hit nothing.

      • getPoint

        public Vector getPoint()
        Get the point in 3D space of the intersection.

      • getMinT

        public double getMinT()
        The parametric distance along the ray to the intersection.

      • isBackfacing

        public boolean isBackfacing()
        Whether our intersection hit the back of the triangle.

      • getNormal

        public Vector getNormal()
        Utility method for getting the normal of the triangle at the intersection point (interpolating the vertex normals), taking into account whether it's backfacing.
